price: 14. Dheh: Allaah keliyaan caabudi anigoo u daacad ah waxbana la wadaajin cibaadada.
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهَ أَعۡبُدُ مُخۡلِصٗا لَّهُۥ دِينِي

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: quli al-laha aʿbudu mukh'liṣan lahu dīnī
